roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with data encryption and access control features.

children.title: Data Encryption
children.description: Introducing data encryption to secure stored information.

children.title: Resolved issues with encryption key management.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the management of encryption keys.

children.title: Fixed errors in data encryption/decryption processes.
children.description: Corrected errors in the processes for encrypting and decrypting data.

children.title: Added support for AES-256 encryption.
children.description: Introduced support for AES-256 encryption for stronger security.

children.title: Implemented automatic key rotation.
children.description: Added features for automatic rotation of encryption keys.

children.title: Access Controls
children.description: Improving access controls for better security and management.

children.title: Corrected issues with user role assignments.
children.description: Fixed problems with assigning roles to users.

children.title: Fixed bugs in access control lists (ACL).
children.description: Resolved issues affecting access control lists.

children.title: Introduced multi-factor authentication (MFA) for access.
children.description: Added support for multi-factor authentication to enhance security.

children.title: Added granular permission settings for different user roles.
children.description: Introduced more detailed permission settings for various user roles.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements for GDPR compliance and audit logging.

children.title: Compliance with GDPR
children.description: Implementing features to comply with GDPR regulations.

children.title: Resolved issues with data subject access requests.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting data subject access requests.

children.title: Fixed bugs in data anonymization processes.
children.description: Resolved issues in the data anonymization processes.

children.title: Implemented automated data retention policies.
children.description: Introduced automated policies for data retention to comply with GDPR.

children.title: Added support for data portability requests.
children.description: Introduced support for handling data portability requests.

children.title: Audit Logging
children.description: Enhancing audit logging for better monitoring and security.

children.title: Corrected issues with log generation.
children.description: Fixed problems with generating audit logs.

children.title: Fixed bugs in log storage and retrieval.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the storage and retrieval of logs.

children.title: Introduced detailed audit logs for all access and changes.
children.description: Added detailed logs to track all access and changes in the system.

children.title: Added real-time monitoring and alerting for suspicious activities.
children.description: Introduced features for real-time monitoring and alerting of suspicious activities.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with HIPAA compliance and performance optimization.

children.title: HIPAA Compliance
children.description: Implementing features to comply with HIPAA regulations.

children.title: Resolved issues with encryption of PHI (Protected Health Information).
children.description: Fixed problems with the encryption of protected health information.

children.title: Fixed errors in access log auditing.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the auditing of access logs.

children.title: Implemented secure data sharing protocols.
children.description: Added secure protocols for sharing sensitive data.

children.title: Added support for HIPAA-compliant data backup and recovery.
children.description: Introduced features for HIPAA-compliant backup and recovery of data.

children.title: Performance Optimization
children.description: Improving performance for faster and more efficient operations.

children.title: Corrected issues with database indexing.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting database indexing.

children.title: Fixed bugs in query execution plans.
children.description: Resolved issues with executing query plans.

children.title: Improved data retrieval speeds.
children.description: Enhanced the speed of data retrieval processes.

children.title: Optimized storage efficiency.
children.description: Improved storage efficiency to reduce resource usage.

children.title: Enhanced Security Features
children.description: Introducing new security features to enhance data protection.

children.title: Resolved vulnerabilities in user authentication.
children.description: Fixed security vulnerabilities in the authentication process.

children.title: Fixed issues with SSL/TLS encryption.
children.description: Resolved problems with SSL/TLS encryption.

children.title: Introduced role-based access control (RBAC).
children.description: Added role-based access control to improve security.

children.title: Added support for IP whitelisting and blacklisting.
children.description: Introduced IP whitelisting and blacklisting for better access control.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.4.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements in data masking and backup and recovery features.

children.title: Data Masking
children.description: Introducing data masking features to protect sensitive information.

children.title: Corrected issues with masking sensitive fields.
children.description: Fixed problems with masking sensitive data fields.

children.title: Fixed bugs in data masking for backups.
children.description: Resolved issues with masking data in backups.

children.title: Added support for dynamic data masking.
children.description: Introduced dynamic data masking to enhance data security.

children.title: Implemented masking for both structured and unstructured data.
children.description: Added masking features for all types of data, structured and unstructured.

children.title: Backup and Recovery
children.description: Enhancing backup and recovery processes for better data protection.

children.title: Resolved issues with incremental backups.
children.description: Fixed problems with performing incremental backups.

children.title: Fixed errors in data restoration processes.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the restoration of data from backups.

children.title: Introduced automated backup scheduling.
children.description: Added features for scheduling automated backups.

children.title: Added support for geographically distributed backups.
children.description: Introduced support for backups distributed across multiple locations.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with AI-driven anomaly detection and data integration.

children.title: AI-Driven Anomaly Detection
children.description: Introducing AI-driven features for real-time anomaly detection.

children.title: Resolved issues with false positives in anomaly detection.
children.description: Fixed problems causing false positives in anomaly detection.

children.title: Fixed errors in machine learning model training.
children.description: Resolved issues with training machine learning models for anomaly detection.

children.title: Implemented AI-driven anomaly detection for real-time threat identification.
children.description: Added AI-driven features to identify threats in real time.

children.title: Added support for customizable anomaly detection rules.
children.description: Introduced customizable rules for anomaly detection to meet specific needs.

children.title: Data Integration
children.description: Enhancing data integration capabilities for seamless data management.

children.title: Corrected issues with integration connectors.
children.description: Fixed problems with connectors used for data integration.

children.title: Fixed bugs in data synchronization across systems.
children.description: Resolved issues with synchronizing data across different systems.

children.title: Added support for integrating with major cloud providers.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating with major cloud service providers.

children.title: Implemented seamless data migration tools.
children.description: Added tools for seamless migration of data between systems.

children.title: Advanced Reporting
children.description: Introducing advanced reporting features for better data insights.

children.title: Resolved issues with report generation times.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the time it takes to generate reports.

children.title: Fixed errors in custom report creation.
children.description: Resolved issues with creating custom reports.

children.title: Introduced advanced reporting features with real-time data.
children.description: Added advanced features for generating reports with real-time data.

children.title: Added support for exportable report formats.
children.description: Introduced support for exporting reports in various formats.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on user activity monitoring and enhanced encryption protocols.

children.title: User Activity Monitoring
children.description: Introducing detailed monitoring features for user activities.

children.title: Resolved issues with activity log completeness.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the completeness of activity logs.

children.title: Fixed bugs in activity log filtering.
children.description: Resolved issues with filtering activity logs.

children.title: Introduced detailed user activity dashboards.
children.description: Added dashboards for detailed monitoring of user activities.

children.title: Added support for automated suspicious activity alerts.
children.description: Introduced automated alerts for detecting suspicious activities.

children.title: Enhanced Encryption Protocols
children.description: Improving encryption protocols for better security.

children.title: Corrected issues with legacy encryption support.
children.description: Fixed problems with supporting legacy encryption protocols.

children.title: Fixed errors in protocol compatibility.
children.description: Resolved compatibility issues with encryption protocols.

children.title: Implemented support for post-quantum cryptography.
children.description: Introduced support for cryptographic methods that are secure against quantum attacks.

children.title: Improved encryption performance with hardware acceleration.
children.description: Enhanced encryption performance by using hardware acceleration.
